def_cn: 漫画;讽刺画;夸张性（或讽刺性）描述
def_en: A caricature of someone is a drawing or description of them that exaggerates their appearance or behaviour in a humorous or critical way.

def_cn: 把…画成漫画;用讽刺性手法描述;夸大
def_en: If you caricature someone, you draw or describe them in an exaggerated way in order to be humorous or critical.
If you describe something as a caricature of an event or situation, you mean that it is a very exaggerated account of it.
